attributes.action: Do reduce the license fee and give us an openly funding reasonably priced national news service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: License fee is shocking. We should be supporting a national independent news service but that’s roughly where the buck should stop. How on earth is £100’s of millions spent on Eastenders a national service to the people of this country or the £18 million contract paid to Jonathan Ross, These are not national services, they should be on their own pay channel with the choice to subscribe. We would like an openly funding reasonably priced national news service.
